duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead the design process from inspiration to finalized tech pack hand off, providing finished design materials for presentations and collateral.
Partner closely with Design Director and Product Marketing team to shape the accessory category offering.
Present category ideas to Design team, Marketing team, and other internal groups, displaying a cohesive design approach.
Study and interpret market conditions and trends related to golf, sharing insights with design leadership, marketing, and development teams.
Actively research trade publications, style analysis, trade fairs, online design tools, and market visits to inspire and promote future thinking.
Utilize live fittings and reviews for each proto round and execute design work according to the visual language of the brand.
Support, inspire, energize, and challenge the immediate design team and cross-functional counterparts.
Understand and follow seasonal calendar and process, adhering to given Corporate Identity guidelines and legal guidance.
General interest in fashion, golf, and sportswear market/trend.

education_certification.credential: Fashion Design degree and/or relevant work experience in performance industry
